SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent

Class FinalListFragmentTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.FinalListFragmentTest
public class FinalListFragmentTest extends Object
Unit tests for FinalListFragment final list functionality.

User stories handled

US 02.06.03: As an organizer I want to see a final list of entrants who enrolled for the event.

These tests validate that the fragment correctly populates the final list of enrolled entrants from Firebase data snapshots, ensuring that:
  • The adapter is properly set up with the retrieved entrants.
  • Data from mocked Firebase snapshots is correctly transformed into Entrant objects.
  • Fragment handles the Firebase database reference chain correctly without requiring real Firebase initialization.

All Firebase interactions are mocked to allow isolated unit testing without network dependencies.
